sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The pciutils package contains lspci, setpci and update-pciids.

sect3.title: lspci
sect3.para: lspci is a utility for displaying information about all PCI buses in the system and all devices connected to them.

sect3.title: setpci
sect3.para: setpci is a utility for querying and configuring PCI devices.

sect3.title: update-pciids
sect3.para: update-pciids fetches the current version of the PCI ID list.
